title: 426. Should America (and FIFA) Pay Reparations?
description: The racial wealth gap in the U.S. is massive. We explore the causes, consequences, and potential solutions. Also: another story of discrimination and economic disparity, this one perpetrated by an international sporting authority. The first of a two-part series.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
